mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tender_evaluation_center (id, client_id, center_name, center_ip, server_name, online_time, online_status, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, create_user) VALUES(#{id}, #{clientId}, #{centerName}, #{centerIp}, #{serverName}, #{onlineTime}, #{onlineStatus}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser})
mapper.update: update tender_evaluation_center set center_name = #{centerName}, center_ip = #{centerIp}, server_name = #{serverName}, online_time = #{onlineTime}, online_status = #{onlineStatus}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, create_user = #{createUser} where client_id = #{clientId}
